name: Smash Star
description:
GK's friends and some other jerks he knows have been abducted for some stupid reason! He must save them! He enlists the help of a little star. Together, they vow to crack some badguy skulls and squish squishy things until all those abducted idiots are save! What an adventure! SMASH!!!

This game is a retro platformer. It's low-res, pixelly and relatively short. I made it to get into Game Maker: Studio. It has some cosmetic issues and a few gameplay annoyances, but other than that, it seems to run quite well.
